entries.title: The January PC game releases and events you should know about
entries.description: Here's what we'll be playing in the first month of 2023.

entries.title: Fallout: London mod shows off working trains, mailbox murderbots
entries.description: The Fallout 4 mod team was kind enough to share a progress update packed with exciting details.

entries.title: Microsoft hopes that adding conversational AI to Bing will actually make people want to use Bing
entries.description: Microsoft is planning to incorporate ChatGPT inside of Bing in a few months.

entries.title: PSA: Steam has a hidden feature that lets you move your game installs around
entries.description: Skip the library and manage all your games from one window using the storage manager.

entries.title: What games did you play over the holidays?
entries.description: The holidays can be a great time to get some gaming done. What did you play to ring in the new year?

entries.title: Google embraces Nvidia GeForce Now with Asus's latest Chromebook
entries.description: The Vibe CX34 Flip Chromebook is great for GeForce Now... as opposed to *ahem* Stadia.

entries.title: Who needs Fallout 5 when you can play first-person Fallout 2 for free?
entries.description: Until the inevitable cease & desist letter, I guess.

entries.title: Ryan Reynolds and Rob McElhenney Easter eggs discovered in FIFA 23
entries.description: The Hollywood stars and Wrexham AFC owners had a few things to say about other teams in the game.

entries.title: Phison has its 14GB/s PCIe 5.0 SSD controller ready but there are no drives in sight
entries.description: E26 controller chip is ready to go.

entries.title: Elgato Stream Deck +
entries.description: A sleeker streamer gadget for the desktop.

entries.title: Toucan Pro Streaming Webcam
entries.description: A no-fuss PC webcam.

entries.title: AMD admits some RX 7900 XTX GPUs have an overheating problem
entries.description: Unfortunately our card is one of them.

entries.title: Who needs RGB inside your PC case when you can project holograms instead?
entries.description: Oh, you know I'm putting Cortana on this thing.

entries.title: The trend in 16:10 gaming laptops over CES 2023 shows we're finally evolving
entries.description: Here's to a new standard in gaming panel aspect ratios, baby.

entries.title: Death Stranding 2 is mirroring Metal Gear Solid 2, and going La-li-lu-le-lo
entries.description: The next generation has always been one of Kojima's big themes, but now it comes with added parenting vibes.

entries.title: Madden fans find franchise saves destroyed after EA said they could play 'without issue'
entries.description: EA reckons it can only recover about 40% of lost player data.

entries.title: Screw dying, says Hideo Kojima, 'I'll probably become an AI and stick around'
entries.description: Life Stranding.

entries.title: Nvidia RTX 4070 Ti
entries.description: The rebadged and un-unlaunched RTX 4080 12GB is here, repped by this MSRP Gigabyte card delivering RTX 3090 frame rates.

entries.title: Cooler Master's latest mech keyboard is a calamitous clash of colours
entries.description: The MK770 ditches RGB lights in favour of cutesy keycaps.

entries.title: Samsung's new microLED TVs are five million times faster than your gaming monitor
entries.description: That's two nanoseconds response times, if you were wondering.

entries.title: This may be the most bizarre PC manual ever
entries.description: "Program manufacturers are natural paranoids".

entries.title: Gaming monitors with tiny screens in the stands and built-in Wi-Fi antennas? Sure
entries.description: ASRock's at least trying something different with its range of Phantom Gaming monitors announced over at CES 2023.

entries.title: Asus outs absurdly fast 540Hz monitor, potentially pricey 27-inch OLED monitor and more
entries.description: A thousand bucks for a 1440p panel?

entries.title: Elden Ring clinches Steam's GOTY award in results with only one weird surprise
entries.description: Hideo Kojima takes home the Steam Deck-focused award, continuing to obey no mortal law but his own.

entries.title: Blade Runner 1997 is still the cyberpunk experience to beat
entries.description: Aren’t you tired of playing copies of copies?

entries.title: Today's Wordle 564 answer and hint for Wednesday, January 4
entries.description: Wordle today: The solution and a hint for the #564 puzzle.

entries.title: Wizards of the Coast has reportedly canceled at least five videogames in development
entries.description: Can something that hasn't been announced really be canceled?

entries.title: 12 survival games to look forward to in 2023
entries.description: Craft an axe. Now sharpen it. We're hacking into the best survival games 2023 has to offer.
